name: Straight Edge
description: A straight edge is a tool used in woodworking to verify flatness or to guide cutting tools. It is essentially a long, straight piece of material, often made of wood, metal, or plastic, that provides a reference line for measuring, marking, or cutting straight lines. Straight edges come in various lengths and widths, making them versatile for tasks such as checking the flatness of surfaces or ensuring that cuts are made accurately.
